title: Looking for Singed-Mains
body:
Hey, 
I am looking for Singed-Mains just to get a club going.
So we can show everybodyelse who is our Waifu.
I am a singed-main myself. 

If you are interested or whatever goahead and add me ingame and we can have a little chat.

Stay Toxic, my friends.

Priflex

replies.body: I might add you only if you play him Support

> Stay Toxic, my friends.

haha you got me :D 
Never say this to this community or they will get even more toxic :P
i dont think thats even possible :D
